shortdesc.ph: Enables or disables the built-in encryption feature.
Enables or disables the built-in encryption feature.

p.codeblock: virtual int enableEncryption(bool enabled, const EncryptionConfig& config) = 0;
public abstract int enableEncryption(boolean enabled, EncryptionConfig config);

section.p: After the user leaves the channel, the SDK automatically disables the built-in encryption feature. To enable it again, call this method before the user rejoins the channel.
After the user leaves the channel, the SDK automatically disables the built-in encryption feature. Call this method again before the user rejoins the channel.

ul.li: All users in the same channel must set the same encryption configuration when calling this method.
Once built-in encryption is enabled, the media streaming feature is not available.
All users in the same channel must set the same encryption configuration when calling this method.
Once the built-in encryption is enabled, the CDN live streaming feature cannot be used.

section.title: Scenario
section.p: Applicable to scenarios with high security requirements.

section.title: Timing
section.p: Call this method before joining a channel.
Call this method before joining a channel.

plentry.pd:
Whether to enable the built-in encryption feature:
: Enable built-in encryption.
: (Default) Disable built-in encryption.

Whether to enable the built-in encryption feature:
: Enable built-in encryption.
: (default) Disable built-in encryption.

ul.li:
< 0: Failure.
-2: Invalid parameter. Please pass in valid parameters.
-4: Incorrect encryption mode or failed to load external encryption library. Please check the enum value or reload the external encryption library.
-7: SDK not initialized. Please initialize the instance before calling this method.

< 0: Failure.
-2: Invalid parameter. Please pass valid parameters.
-4: Incorrect built-in encryption mode or failed to load external encryption library. Please check the enum value or reload the external encryption library.
-7: SDK not initialized. Please initialize the instance before calling this method.
